1.name: Spirit Blade
1.details:
Every 3rd basic attack of Blade deals additional physical damage (scaling with physical power) and spawns a Spirit Blade on top of the enemy after 1 second.

Spirit Blade will stay for 10 seconds. Blade can pick up a Spirit Blade to gain increased movement speed that decays over 2 seconds, and allow a percentage of his next basic attack damage to convert to true damage instead.

Blade can store a stack for each Spirit Blade he picks up (maximum 5 Spirit Blades).

2.name: Condemn
2.details:
Bladeâ€™s next basic attack within 5 seconds deals additional physical damage (scaling with physical power).

When Blade kills an enemy with Condemn, half of the mana cost will be refunded and the cooldowns will be reduced by half.

In addition, a Spirit Blade will spawn on top of that unit.

3.name: Blade Work
3.details: Blade summons a Spirit Blade in a target location. Within 10 seconds, Blade gains increased movement speed towards all the present Spirit Blades.

4.name: Blade Surge
4.details: Blade blinks to a Spirit Blade and gains increased attack speed for the next 3 basic attacks.

5.name: Blade Storm
5.details:
Blade channels for 1 second, then dash to a target location, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies within the path.

In addition, all the Spirit Blades will return to him during the dash, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies in the path and greatly slowing them for 1 second.
